document.full_text: a hat-trick by jaromir jagr led czech republic to a 4-0 win over a young united states team wednesday, earning the holders a place in the semi-finals of the world ice hockey championship.
document.title: jagr hat trick takes czech champions into hockey semi-finals
lines_and_colors: a hat-trick by jaromir jagr led czech republic to a 4-0 win over a young united states team wednesday, earning the holders a place in the semi-finals of the world ice hockey championship.
